name: Mocha
steps: Brew an espresso into a mug, cup or glass.
Add two teaspoons of hot chocolate mix or cocoa powder and mix with the espresso.*
Foam and texture the required quantity of milk, ensuring we have a good quality foam.
Add the milk to the cup containing the chocolate espresso and top with whipped cream.

name: Espresso Macchiato
steps: Prepare an Espresso in an Espresso cup and add sugar if desired
Top the Espresso with a little frothed milk

name: Americano
steps: Use an espresso machine or manual espresso maker to make one shot of espresso and pour it into a mug
Heat water to about 190 degrees Fahrenheit. Pour it into the espresso.

name: Breve
steps: Steam and froth half-and-half at 145-160 degrees Fahrenheit and allow the half and half to set
Pour steamed half-and-half into a mug, holding back the foam and pour half of the foam on top
Pull one 2 oz shot of espresso and slowly pour the espresso into the mug
Top with more foam

name: Cappuccino
steps: Foam and texture the required quantity of milk - Remember! We want more foam than steamed milk
Brew a single or double espresso (as per taste or order) directly into your serving cup
Gently swirl the milk to release any large air bubbles - tap the milk jug against a counter to remove any stubborn bubbles
Pour the milk over the espresso from a low height for a smooth drink

name: Espresso
steps: Insert the portafilter into the brew head
Start pulling the espresso shot.
Stop the shot once it's brewed for around 20 seconds.

name: Espresso Panna
steps: Pull your espresso shot
Whip cream until stiff peaks form
Dollop whipped cream on your espresso

name: Flat White
steps: Prepare a double espresso (doppio) whilst remembering to ensure a nice even tamp for a smooth, pure coffee extraction
Foam your milk, paying attention to creating a nice smooth microfoam, during the latter stages of you milk foaming, start brewing your espresso
After frothing your milk, gently tap the jug or bump on a table to remove any unwanted large air bubbles
Finally, pour 100ml of the frothed milk into the espresso, this should create a rich floating crema on top of the milk

name: Latte
steps: Prepare an espresso (single or double) directly into a latte glass
Foam your milk prior to brewing your espresso, paying attention to creating a nice smooth microfoam
Begin pouring the frothed milk to your espresso from a relatively high position, and continue to pour whilst lowering the milk and steepening your pouring angle
